itunes:title: Ruth Week 2 with Suzy Silk
title: Ruth Week 2 with Suzy Silk
description:
For the second and final week in the book of Ruth, Raechal and Amanda are joined by pastor, teacher, and author Suzy Silk. Together they discuss the richness of the cultural implications found throughout Ruth and Naomi’s story and how God was at work in very unconventional ways. Join them and be reminded of the depth of our redemption that was foreshadowed in this story and fully realized in Jesus. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Ruth reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Title collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/ruth-week-2-with-suzy-silk
